description: Strengthening South-South Cooperation throught the Pivotal Country Approach (China)

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Improved national policy and institutional environment for South-South cooperaiton by developing, and seeking the approval by the Chinese government, of a national policy on South-South cooperation.
